channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform

item.title: CVE-2017-1148|2024-09-17T00:40:58.458Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.2 and 7.3 with OpenPages Loss Event Entry (LEE) application could allow a user to obtain sensitive information including private APIs that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 122201.

item.title: CVE-2016-3048|2024-09-17T03:33:50.391Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 114711.

item.title: CVE-2017-1290|2024-09-17T04:14:40.859Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125151.

item.title: CVE-2020-4536|2024-09-17T01:46:05.482Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 8.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 182907.
